Title: Relates to childcare and dependent care reimbursement for volunteer members of public bodies
Summary: Provides for reimbursement of expenses for childcare and dependent care for volunteer members of public bodies.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law and the public officers law, in relation to childcare and dependent care reimbursement for volunteer members of public bodies
